item.title: My_ArchLinux_Config
item.description: Install the necessary software sudo pacman -S i3-gaps i3-wm ranger alacritty dunst conky neofetch polybar rofi betterlockscreen youtube-dl zsh chromium ueberzug mplayer vlc ffmpegthumbnailer icalingua p7zip lolcat atool unzip-iconv unzip bluez bluez-utils pulsemixer pip python-pip kde-connect neovim noto-fonts-emoji pacvis gnome-keyring go blender opencl-nvidia wps-office-cn wps-office-mui-zh-cn ttf-wps-fonts hugo highlight ripgrep nodejs npm wget networkmanager xclip v2ray v2raya
